Returns the original default database without using the overrides.

Returns:

Throws:
SettingsException - If a default database isn't defined.

getDefaultOverride

public static Database getDefaultOverride()
Returns the default database override in the current thread.

Returns:
May be null.

overrideDefault

public static Database overrideDefault(Database override)
Overrides the default database with the given override in the current thread.

Parameters:
override - Can't be null.
Returns:
Current default database before overriding.

restoreDefault

public static Database restoreDefault()
Restores the default database to the previous value before overrideDefault(com.psddev.dari.db.Database) was called.

Returns:
Current default database before the restoration.
Throws:
NoSuchElementException - If overrideDefault(com.psddev.dari.db.Database) wasn't called before.

isIgnoreReadConnection

public static boolean isIgnoreReadConnection()
Deprecated. Use Query.isMaster() instead.

Returns true if the databases should ignore read-specific connections.

Deprecated. Use Query.setMaster(boolean) or Query.master instead.

public static <T extends Database> T getFirst(Class<T> databaseClass)

The default database is always checked first.
